blogPost.excerpt: 1️⃣ We love catching up with friends, but hey, life gets busy. 2️⃣ Ketchup will actually make you a better friend by nudging you at the right times to reach out to friends. 3️⃣ I've actually grown my friendships since I started building and using Ketchup.
blogPost.body: 1️⃣ We love catching up with friends, but hey, life gets busy. 2️⃣ Ketchup will actually make you a better friend by nudging you at the right times to reach out to friends. 3️⃣ I've actually grown my friendships since I started building and using Ketchup.
blogPost.title: Ketchup - Be a better friend
blogPost.author: Sid Gandhi

localize.description: 1️⃣我们喜欢和朋友聊天，但是嘿，生活变得忙碌起来。2️⃣番茄酱会在正确的时间提醒你联系朋友，实际上会让你成为更好的朋友。3️⃣自从我开始构建和使用番茄酱以来，我的友谊实际上已经增长了。
1️⃣我們喜歡和朋友聊天，但是嘿，生活變得忙碌起來。2️⃣番茄醬會在正確的時間提醒你聯繫朋友，實際上會讓你成爲更好的朋友。3️⃣自從我開始構建和使用番茄醬以來，我的友誼實際上已經增長了。
